      • asXMLDOM

        public static Document asXMLDOM(Map<String,Object> map)
        Convert a Map to XML DOM. The root node is an error element. Collections are represented as child entry elements.
        Parameters:
        map - The map to convert.
        Returns:
        The DOM document.
